title: Trump Hate Fest Explodes Across the Globe—They Want Him Dead and This Is How They’ll Attempt It

organizations.name: trump hate fest explodes across the globe

text:
Last 24 Hours: Total: Trump Hate Fest Explodes Across the Globe—They Want Him Dead and This Is How They’ll Attempt It Saturday, January 21, 2017 19:10 % of readers think this story is Fact. Add your two cents. By Lisa Haven From Washington to Boston, New York to Denver, Chicago to Los Angeles, the brainwashed goons have come out from every corner to protest Donald Trump and stand for Women’s rights—a move hijacked by the left. Truth is, Donald Trump has nothing against women’s rights, he supports them, and yet here we are. Sadly, these people actually believe Trump is a racist and that their rights are under attack by his administration, when the truth is that the globalists are using them to push the globalist’s agenda and usher in their utopian nightmare! More on this breaking report below… Here are some of these protesters in action… Subscribe to My Website at: www.LisaHaven.News Check Me out On Youtube
